title: 10 MR Blues
body: Back before you were limited to only be able to buy runes to the cap you could use, I accidentally bought 10 Magic Resist Glyphs. Since there isn't a rune sink anymore, is there a way I could have a Rioter refund one of them so I only have 9?

replies.body: I can remove an extra rune for you, but we're not offering a refund for it.  You bought it a very long time ago.  :P  I'm also not sure it'd be worth using any tokens!  That said, let me know and I'll just eat your extra glyph.  {{item:2054}}

"Sorry, we can't give you back your 400 ip. The profit loss on such an act would drive us into bankruptcy. Small Indy company, plz understand."

Go ahead, thanks! Seeing that extra rune is extremely annoying any time I'm making a page. And I don't have any tokens left. Which that's another thing, I read on the initial post for the refund tokens that they were supposed to be 3 forever, but I've heard other people saying they've been getting an extra 1 per season. I've never gotten any extra I'm fairly certain. Looking at my account, I'm still at 0 and I used them all up years ago. Just want to ask if I'm supposed to be getting more or not.
Nope, we haven't granted or restored refund tokens.  Extra token has been removed, you may need to relog.  Good luck out there on the rift!
Can you remove me all my runes that aren't tier 3? I hate seeing them in the rune list >.<

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll take a look at your specific case.  It's unlikely that we can offer refunds, but we'll look into removing unwanted content.  We'll get back to you!
